title: Exposing Our Dirtiest Texts
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
description:
We just played Truth or Drink and are dealing with the aftermath, Ilya loses a 10 episode long bet, Jake Paul's new fight, and exposing our dirtiest texts. Leave us a funny review and we'll read it on air!


Watch our FULL Video Podcast on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjmqbxZsoH1YwihrGgU1vPA


Follow our Podcast on Instagram: @lightweightspod https://www.instagram.com/lightweightspod/
